dublin_core.dcvalue: In the context of the growing proportion of seniors in the western world population and the efforts provided in home care services we have developed a computer vision system for monitoring medication intake The system detects automatically medication intake using a single low cost webcam Person detection and tracking over the video sequence is done using color based techniques while the recognition of the medication intake activity is performed using our main contribution a three level scenario model Experimental results in controlled conditions are shown and we discuss improvements to our system
